unnormalised: Guys, check out this property listing at 12A, Defence Colony, New Delhi, 110024. It's a 3BHK apartment, roughly 1500 sq ft. The asking price is Rs. 3.5 Cr, but I think you can negotiate. It's close to the metro station and near the main market in Block A. Property taxes are approx. Rs. 30,000 p.a.
normalised: Guys, check out this property listing at twelve A, Defence Colony, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and twenty four. It's a three B-H-K apartment, roughly one thousand five hundred square feet. The asking price is rupee three point five crore, but I think you can negotiate. It's close to the metro station and near the main market in Block A. Property taxes are approximately rupee thirty thousand per annum.
